attrib:
RADIUS: 625
DURATION: 16
DAMAGE OVER TIME: 12 / 16 / 20 / 24
ARMOR REDUCTION: 4 / 5 / 6 / 7
cmb:
MANA COST: 130/140/150/160
COOLDOWN: 22
desc: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.
lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.
name: alchemist_acid_spray

attrib:
MAX STUN: 1.75 / 2.5 / 3.25 / 4
MAX DAMAGE: 150 / 220 / 290 / 360
RADIUS: 175
cmb:
MANA COST: 120
COOLDOWN: 16
desc: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
notes:
Alchemist can move and act normally while brewing.
A timer above Alchemist's head will indicate the remaining brew time.
Maximum effects are achieved after 5 seconds.
You can deny yourself with this skill.
Unstable Concoction cannot be disjointed.
lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.
name: alchemist_unstable_concoction

attrib:
RECENT KILL WINDOW: 30
BASE BONUS GOLD: 6 / 8 / 10 / 12
EXTRA BONUS GOLD: 3
desc: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 12/20/28/36 gold.
lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.
name: alchemist_goblins_greed

attrib:
DURATION: 25
BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.4 / 1.2 / 1
BONUS HEALTH REGEN: 50 / 75 / 100
BONUS MANA REGEN: 3 / 7.5 / 12
BONUS MOVE SPEED: 30 / 40 / 60
cmb:
MANA COST: 50/100/150
COOLDOWN: 45
desc: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
notes: Has a 0.35 second transformation time, which can be used to dodge projectiles and stuns.
lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.
name: alchemist_chemical_rage

desc: Throw it before it blows up!
name: alchemist_unstable_concoction_throw
